title: Align Flutter Cultivar Models with Backend Schema
description: RESOLVE DATA MODEL MISMATCH: Backend uses agriculture/cultivation schema (indica/sativa%, seed_count, cycle_time) while Flutter uses science/laboratory schema (thcContent, cbdContent, effects, flavor). These are fundamentally different data models requiring architectural decision.
acceptance_criteria: CRITICAL: Resolve data model mismatch between backend agriculture schema and Flutter science schema
Backend schema confirmed: indica/sativa percentages, seed_count, cycle_time, cultivation metrics
Flutter schema identified: thcContent, cbdContent, effects, flavor - laboratory data model
Architecture decision required: Option A (redesign Flutter), Option B (hybrid backend), Option C (separate apps)
Document the mismatch for architectural review before proceeding
notes: CRITICAL DISCOVERY: Flutter models use cannabis science data (thc/cbd content, effects, flavor) while backend uses agriculture data (indica/sativa %, cultivation metrics). This is a fundamental architectural mismatch, not just terminology. Requires decision from architecture team.
